name: Raining Blood: Hellfire
description:
• WELCOME DEMON HUNTER!

    Raining Blood is a COD Zombies inspired top-down shooter featuring tons of unique weapons and unlimited upgrades. Make it rain BLOOD!

  • STOP THE INVASION

    Survive long enough to solve the puzzles and enter The Old Cathedral to destroy the source of the demonic corruption.




  • UNLIMITED UPGRADES

    Increase your power exponentially, combining as many upgrades as you want. Multiply your damage, carry more guns, run faster, increase the number of bullets fired per shot, and much more.




    • 100+ UNIQUE WEAPONS:

      Burn them with the Flame-thrower, blow them up with the Rocket Launcher and grenades, freeze them with ice guns or simply annihilate them with the Gatling Gun.





    • DISCOVER THE TRUTH


      You play as the last clergy of the Holy Exorcists, ancient creatures that protect humanity from demons. A thousand years of peace has rendered their existence purposeless, but not for Azaus' group. He has always known that Hell never rests, and the longer the silence, the greater the storm that follows. Their quests have led them to an ancient church where they will face unimaginable terrors.

    • BE PART OF THE COMMUNITY
